name: venhoff_2025_reasoning_functions
instructions: Choose exactly one label that best matches the sentence's primary function.

labels.name: Plan Generation
labels.description: Stating or deciding on a plan of action, meta-reasoning.

labels.name: Fact Retrieval
labels.description: Recalling facts, formulas, or problem details without computation.

labels.name: Active Computation
labels.description: Algebra, calculations, or other manipulations toward the answer.

labels.name: Result Consolidation
labels.description: Aggregating intermediate results, summarizing, or preparing the final answer.

labels.name: Self Checking
labels.description: Verifying previous steps, checking calculations, and re-confirmations.
